name: Stan's cave of dragons
description:
Play as Stan as you venture through the dragon's cave!

Play with two powerups as you leap over spikes and fight the great dragon. Be wary however as the cave is filled with secret rooms and traps.  

This is the first time i have made a game for a jam, and i'm really proud that i coul complete it within a weekend. thanks so much for playing and reviewing it! ^_^

The jam version is incomplete and may contain several game breaking bugs, please report them in the comments
